alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 6:32PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Phelps, northern Kearney and southwestern Buffalo Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 632 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holdrege, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Funk around 640 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Kearney. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 255 and 283. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
